model_outputs.question:

Then, Bob and Alice swap books, so Alice gets Frankenstein and Bob gets Ulysses. Finally, Claire and Bob swap books again, so Claire gets Ulysses and Bob gets Frankenstein.

At the end of the semester, Bob has Lolita, which means that Alice must have given it to her. Therefore, the only option that fits the given scenario is (C) Lolita.
